frontMatter.title: Project Process
frontMatter.metaDescription: A set of activities and the systematic process that needs to be carried out to develop the product in both engineering and delivery disciplines.

checklist.question: PI_Test_Demo-Have you access to overall process guidance for the product engineering?
checklist.expectation: PI_Test_Demo-Team should have access to documented process policy, proceedures, and work instructions

checklist.question: Have you identified a development or engineering process?
checklist.expectation: A documented process clearly indicating why it has been selected. Eg. SCRUM along with product design proceedures

checklist.question: Have you identified a DevOps process?
checklist.expectation: A documented process clearly indicating why it has been selected over other devops processes eg. process which includes automated CD

checklist.question: Have you identified a quality engineering process?
checklist.expectation: A documented process clearly indicating why it has been selected eg. process which assures the quality across all stages of the lifecycle of the product

checklist.question: Have you identified a release management process?
checklist.expectation: A documented process clearly indicating why it has been selected eg. process which assures the suitable SLA and minimum lead time.

checklist.question: Have you identified a release management process?
checklist.expectation: A documented process clearly indicating why it has been selected eg. process which assures the suitable SLA and minimum lead time.

checklist.question: Have you identified a product management process?
checklist.expectation: A documented process clearly indicating why it has been selected eg. ability to translate business needs into a features to be engineered.
